structure.unit: Medical Malpractice Self Insurance Trust Funds

law.catch_line: Fund Declared To Be Charitable And Benevolent Institution; Exemption From Taxes
law.text: A fund is hereby declared to be a charitable and benevolent institution, and all of its assets shall be exempt from all and every state, county, district, municipal and school tax, if all of its participants qualify for exemption from federal taxes under 26 U.S.C.
